headline: LuluLemon: Bernstein upgrades stock, sees consumer recovery
summary: Bernstein analyst Aneesha Sherman has upgraded Lululemon (LULU) to Outperform from Market Perform. Her optimistic outlook for 2025 is driven by an anticipated turning point in the company's Americas business, supported by increased spending from higher-income consumers. Wealth! anchors Seana Smith and Brad Smith dive into the details, discussing Sherman's outlook on the broader athletic wear market. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Angel Smith
